NNIPdevelopment.datageneration.datageneration

DataGenerationWorkChain to generate a training dataset

DataGenerationWorkChain

WorkChain to generate a training dataset.

Module Contents

NNIPdevelopment.datageneration.datageneration.StructureData[source]
NNIPdevelopment.datageneration.datageneration.SinglefileData[source]
NNIPdevelopment.datageneration.datageneration.RattleStructureGenerator(n_configs, rattle_fraction, max_sigma_strain, frac_vacancies, vacancies_per_config, **in_structure_dict)[source]

Generate structures.

Parameters:

  • in_structure_list – A list of AiiDA StructureData nodes

  • n_configs – Int with the number of configurations to generate

  • rattle_fraction – Float with the rattle fraction

  • max_sigma_strain – Float with the maximum strain factor

  • frac_vacancies – Float with the fraction of vacancies

  • vacancies_per_config – Int with the number of vacancies per configuration

NNIPdevelopment.datageneration.datageneration.InputStructureGenerator(**in_structure_dict)[source]

Add input structures to the dataset.

Parameters:

in_structure_list – List of AiiDA StructureData nodes

NNIPdevelopment.datageneration.datageneration.IsolatedStructureGenerator(**in_structure_dict)[source]

Generate isolated atoms.

Parameters:

in_structure_list – List of AiiDA StructureData nodes

NNIPdevelopment.datageneration.datageneration.WriteDataset(**dataset_lists_dict)[source]

Combine datasets to single dataset_list.

Parameters:

structures – A list of AiiDA StructureData nodes

NNIPdevelopment.datageneration.datageneration.get_min_interatomic_distances(positions, cell)[source]

For each atom, calculate the minimum distance to any other atom in the structure.

Parameters:

  • positions – A numpy array of atomic positions

  • cell – A numpy array of the cell vectors

NNIPdevelopment.datageneration.datageneration.uniform_random_atomic_displacement(positions, min_distances, max_displacement_fraction)[source]

Displace atoms randomly in a uniform manner.

Parameters:

  • positions – A numpy array of atomic positions

  • min_distances – A numpy array of minimum interatomic distances

  • max_displacement_fraction – A float that determines the maximum displacement as a fraction of the minimum interatomic distance
